de.ityx.contex.interfaces.management

Interface IManagedServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ContexService, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManagedServerClient

    public interface IManagedServer
extends ContexService
    Access to internal settings of contex via a server call.
    Author:
    root

      • createMaster

        boolean createMaster(String name,
                   String username,
                   String password)
                     throws TransactionException
        Creates a master (if license provides this functionality) with given username and password. If user or password is null the default is used.
        Parameters:
        name - the name for new master
        username - the username for master or null if default user should be used
        password - the password for given user or null if default password should be used
        Returns:
        Throws:
        TransactionException

      • setMasterUser

        boolean setMasterUser(long masterid,
                    String user,
                    String password)
                      throws TransactionException
        Set a new username and password for given master.
        Parameters:
        masterid -
        user - the new username or null if username should not be changed
        password - the new password or null if password should not be changed
        Returns:
        true iff user or password are successfully set
        Throws:
        TransactionException

      • createICatDefaultPath

        void createICatDefaultPath(long master,
                         long subcat,
                         String defaultpath,
                         boolean returndefault)
                           throws TransactionException
        Create a default path in ICat. If the system isn't able to categorize a text, normally "null" is returned. With a given defaultpath, this path is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        master -
        subcat -
        defaultpath -
        returndefault -
        Throws:
        TransactionException

      • rebootServer

        void rebootServer()
                  throws TransactionException,
                         IOException
        Beendet den Serverprozess mit System.exit(-13). Ist Contex also über die startup.jar und dem Parameter "fork" gestartet worden, wird der Server erneut gestartet.
        Throws:
        TransactionException
        IOException

      • importContexMasterXML

        void importContexMasterXML(String xml,
                         String masterName,
                         boolean delete)
                           throws TransactionException,
                                  Exception
        Imports Masterdata from a XML-String.
        Parameters:
        xml - A XML-String with former exported Materdata
        masterName - The Name of the Master-Project, where the data shall be imported to
        delete - Shall existing masterdata be deleted?
        Throws:
        Exception
        TransactionException

      • exportContexMasterToXML

        String exportContexMasterToXML(String masterName,
                             Subsystem[] subsystems)
                               throws TransactionException
        Exports MasterData to a XML-String For all Subsystems use ClassCollector.getAllSubsystems() and NOT ALL or EVERYTHING!
        Parameters:
        masterName - The Name of the Master-Project to be exported
        subsystems - The Subsystems, that shall be exported
        Returns:
        Throws:
        TransactionException
        See Also:
        ClassCollector
